name: Dr. Aman Bumrow
about: Top Cardiologist at Christ Hospital, London. Specialized in interventional cardiology with over 10 years of experience treating heart conditions. Expert in cardiac catheterization and angioplasty procedures.

name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
about: Leading dermatologist specializing in cosmetic and medical dermatology. Expert in skin cancer detection, acne treatment, and anti-aging procedures.
services: Skin Care, Cosmetic Procedures, Acne Treatment

name: Dr. Michael Chen
about: Experienced orthopedic surgeon specializing in joint replacement and sports medicine. Has performed over 2000 successful surgeries.
